verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> man <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G770>sick<s%>, named <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%>, <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G963%G1537>Bethany<s%>, the <S%G2968>town<s%> of <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G79>sister<s%> <S%G3136>Martha<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%>(It <S%G2258>was<s%> that <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G218>anointed<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> with <S%G3464>ointment<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1591>wiped<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> with <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2359>hair<s%>, <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> was <S%G770>sick<s%>.)

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> his <S%G79>sisters<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2396>behold<s%>, he <S%G3739>whom<s%> thou <S%G5368>lovest<s%> is <S%G770>sick<s%>.

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that, he <S%G2036>said<s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> sickness <S%G769><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> , that <S%G2443><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> might be glorified <S%G1392><s%> thereby <S%G1223%G846><s%> .
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3136>Martha<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G79>sister<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%>.

<S%G5613>When<s%> he had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he was <S%G770>sick<s%>, he <S%G3306>abode<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G5119%G3303>still<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the same <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3739>where<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%>.
<S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> saith <S%G3004>he<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, Let us go <S%G71><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Judaea <S%G2449><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> .

His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G4461>Master<s%>, the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> of <S%G3568>late<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> to <S%G3034>stone<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> goest <S%G5217>thou<s%> <S%G1563>thither<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%>, Are there <S%G1526><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> hours <S%G5610><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> ? If <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> , he stumbleth <S%G4350><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> , because <S%G3754><s%> he seeth <S%G991><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> .

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the night <S%G3571><s%> , he stumbleth <S%G4350><s%> , because <S%G3754><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%> .

These <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G846>he<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Our <S%G2257><s%> friend <S%G5384><s%> Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> sleepeth <S%G2837><s%> ; but <S%G235><s%> I go <S%G4198><s%> , that <S%G2443><s%> I may awake <S%G1852><s%> him <S%G846><s%> out of sleep <S%G1852><s%> .
<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> he <S%G2837>sleep<s%>, he shall do <S%G4982>well<s%>.

<S%G1161>Howbeit<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2046>spake<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1565>they<s%> <S%G1380>thought<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he had <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> taking of <S%G2838>rest<s%> in <S%G5258>sleep<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I am glad <S%G5463><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> your sakes <S%G5209><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I was <S%G2252%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> , to the intent <S%G2443><s%> ye may believe <S%G4100><s%> ; nevertheless <S%G235><s%> let us go <S%G71><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> .

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus<s%>, unto his <S%G4827>fellowdisciples<s%>, Let <S%G71>us<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G71>go<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> may <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%>, he <S%G2147>found<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> lain <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3419>grave<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%>.
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G963>Bethany<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1451>nigh<s%> unto <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G1178>fifteen<s%> <S%G4712>furlongs<s%> <S%G575>off<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3136>Martha<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137%G4012>Mary<s%>, <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G3888>comfort<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3136>Martha<s%>, as soon <S%G5613>as<s%> she <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2064>coming<s%>, went and <S%G5221>met<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G2516>sat<s%> still <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%>, that <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>, <S%G3754%G3745%G302>whatsoever<s%> thou wilt <S%G154>ask<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G1325>give<s%> it <S%G4671>thee<s%>.

<S%G3136>Martha<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he shall rise <S%G450>again<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her<s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> the life <S%G2222><s%> : he that believeth <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> , though <S%G2579><s%> he were dead <S%G599><s%> , yet shall he live <S%G2198><s%> :

As soon <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1565>she<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that, she <S%G1453>arose<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, Where <S%G4226><s%> have ye laid <S%G5087><s%> him <S%G846><s%> ? They <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%>.
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1145>wept<s%>.
<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G2396>Behold<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> he <S%G5368>loved<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>!

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1690>groaning<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3419%G1161>grave<s%>. <S%G3767>Then<s%> they took <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> from the place <S%G3757>where<s%> the <S%G2348>dead<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G2749>laid<s%>. <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G142>lifted<s%> <S%G507>up<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, Father <S%G3962><s%> , I thank <S%G2168><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou hast heard <S%G191><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou hearest <S%G191><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> : but <S%G235><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the people <S%G3793><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> stand by <S%G4026><s%> I said <S%G2036><s%> it , that <S%G2443><s%> they may believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> hast sent <S%G649><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> .
<S%G2532>And<s%> when he <S%G5023>thus<s%> had <S%G2036>spoken<s%>, he <S%G2905>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%>, Lazarus <S%G2976><s%> , come <S%G1204><s%> forth <S%G1854><s%> .

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G2300>seen<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%>, <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
